title: When will the NTSE stage 1 happen in 2020-21? - Quora

response.answer_text: As for now, no dates have been schedule for NTSE stage 1 2020-21. But it is likely to be held in January. So you should be targeting to complete your syllabus till December 2020 so that you can have a month for revision. Edit 1-A PDF is spreading that NTSE is in December but it is more likely to be a fake PDF. Until and unless you get a notification from official website of NCERT don't believe in any of them. Best of luck👍🏻
